description:
Detective Yamamura`s past holds a key to solve the mystery of the murder on the border between Gunma and Nagano. With the best detectives on the scene, can they solve this murder mystery? Did the victim leave any clues behind?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gunma to Nagano: Border no Itai (Kouhen)
The Body on the Gunma-Nagano Border (Part 2)
群馬と長野 県境[ボーダー]の遺体 (後編)
